properties.name: City Hall
properties.description: Posted by Nubeli100 Queen St. West, Toronto, ONWhere the mayor and councillors meet and have offices. Lots of neat events and protests take place in front at Nathan Phillips Square. It also happens to be a Bikeshare hub

properties.name: Community Bicycle Network
properties.description: Posted by Nubeli  761 Queen Street West, Toronto, ON, CanadaBicycle network for the downtown Toronto community. A hub for Bikeshare bikes, and community workshops like Wenches with Wrenches and Toolworks.

properties.name: Cycle Therapy
properties.description: Posted by Nubeli 1223 Dundas St, torontoNew community bike store on the new Dundas East bike lanes (at Carlaw). They have great workshops for beginning cyclists and also have a Bikeshare hub. They also have bike trailers for rent.

properties.name: Grapefruit Moon
properties.description: Posted by Nubeli 968 Bathurst Street, Toronto, ONFunky little neighbourhood diner serves some amazing fries, vegetarian choices, and fresh juices.

properties.name: Grassroots Annex
properties.description: Posted by Nubeli  408 Bloor Street West, Toronto, ONEnvironmental products store in the Annex. Find anything from energy efficient lightbulbs to funky hemp clothes to recycled cards and notebooks.

properties.name: Grassroots Riverdale
properties.description: Posted by Nubeli 372 Danforth Avenue, torontoEnvironmental products store, also have a store near Bloor and Spadina. They have a Bikeshare hub.

properties.name: Harbourfront Community Centre
properties.description: Posted by Nubeli 627 Queens Quay West, torontoCommunity centre at the harbourfront. Bikeshare hub.

properties.name: Jet Fuel
properties.description: Posted by Nubeli  519 Parliament St, torontoFunky coffee shop packed with Cabbagetown locals and hardcore cyclists. Sponsers Jet Fuel Cycling Team. Coffee and only coffee. They have a Bikeshare hub.

properties.name: Masaryk-Cowan Community Centre
properties.description: Posted by Nubeli 220 Cowan Avenue, torontoCommunity centre in the heart of Parkdale, accessible to disadvantaged people. Games room, activities, library next door. Bikeshare hub.

properties.name: Mountain Equipment Co-op
properties.description: Posted by Janedoe 400 King St. W, Toronto, ON

properties.name: OPIRG - University of Toronto
properties.description: Posted by Nubeli 563 Spadina Ave, torontoOntario Public Interest Research Group at University of Toronto. Bikeshare hub.

properties.name: SAC, University of Toronto
properties.description: Posted by Nubeli12 Hart House Circle, Toronto, ONStudent Administrative Council at University of Toronto. They are also a Bikeshare hub.

properties.name: Scadding Court Community Centre
properties.description: Posted by Nubeli   707 Dundas St. W., torontoCommunity centre with a pool and public library, close to Kensington Market (Dundas and Bathurst). Many activities like dance classes, gymnastics, even fishing in the summer! They have a Bikeshare hub.

properties.name: The 519 Church Street Community Centre
properties.description: Posted by Nubeli 519 Church Street, torontoLots of programming, especially geared towards the lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgendered communities. They have a Bikeshare hub. 416-392-6874

properties.name: The Bike Joint
properties.description: Posted by Nubeli 290 1/2 Harbord Street, Toronto, ONSmall but friendly neighbourhood bike store, owned by Derek Chadbourne
